page.title: 04A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I am a 10 year old pupil of Crynallt Junior school. At about 0745 h I get up, wash and brush my teeth. I have a breakfast of cereal and a cup of tea at 0815 h. At 0820 I go upstairs and put on my school uniform. I collect my school-bag from my bedroom and walk to school. I arrive at school at 0855 h.I line up with other children in my class when school begins at 0900 h. I go to my classroom for the first lesson which is usually mathematics.At 1030 h there is a break when I go to the kitchen to buy something to eat. Lessons restart at 1050 h and continue until lunch-break at noon.I have lunch in the school canteen. School restarts at 1305 h . At this time I participate in group work.From 1425 h until 1440 h there is a final break . Afterwards there is a games or story period and school finishes at 1535 h.I go home.
